name: Item Label With Price
raw_commands:
SIZE 2,1
DIRECTION 1
CLS

TEXT 128,4,"1",0,1,1,"CLOTHING CENTER"
BARCODE 64,20,"128",40,1,0,1,6,"{{doc.item_code}}"

BAR 0, 80, 406, 5
BAR 198, 85, 5, 203

{% set pricing = get_erpnext_price(doc.item_code) -%}

{% if pricing.discount_percent %}
TEXT 50,100,"2",0,1,1,"PRECIO:"
TEXT 40,132,"3",0,1,1,"{{ pricing.formatted_mrp }}"

TEXT 253,100,"2",0,1,1,"OFERTA:"
TEXT 243,132,"3",0,1,1,"{{ pricing.formatted_price }}"
TEXT 280,162,"1",0,1,1,"{{ pricing.formatted_discount_percent }}"
{% else %}
TEXT 175,108,"2",0,1,1,"PRECIO:"
TEXT 175,128,"3",0,1,1,"{{ pricing.formatted_price }}"
{% endif %}

PRINT 1,1
END
